
```{r}
s11 = c("A1", "A2")
s11
```

```{r}
s22 = c(paste0("A", 3:10), paste0("B", 1:10))
s22
```

```{r}
p11 = c(0.5, 0.5)
p11
```

```{r}
p22 = replicate(18, 1/18)
p22
```

```{r}
sample1 = sample(s11, size = 1, prob = p11)
sample1
```

```{r}
sample2 = sample(s22, size = 1, prob = p22)
sample2
```
```{r}
c(sample(s11, size=1, prob=p11), sample(s22, size=1, prob=p22))
```
